page.title: 08Employment in Aston
page.content:
My dad lives in Aston & has worked at Treeton pit for 15 years. There are three shifts, nights, days, & afternoons.He wears overalls,boots,& helmet with a lamp on top.He makes underground road ways with boring machines & explosives to gain access to coal. Arches hold up the road.Miners travel in the mine on a riding paddy.He hands in his check number 219 to duty office & collects lamp from the cabin.After his shifts he returns to his locker & removes his clothes & goes to the showers to wash off the coal dust.Then he comes home.
N.C.
